item.title: Very long grass seed in the park by basketball area and verges, 21st June
item.description:
Please could the grass seed be cut and collected as it is very dangerous to dogs and all I the animals. Several dogs over the last couple of years have had to be taken to vets vets and sedated to remove the grass seeds. My own dog had a couple stuck in his paw last year and some stuck to his body already this year. Please cut all grass areas and collected as it after. Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stanhope Grove, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Put double yellow lines please!, 21st June
item.description:
This is a bus route. As there are no restrictions to park in single yellow line, cars are being parked in parallel as you can see. This impacts the B11 bus as the bus cannot pass. See photo. A bus had to reverse dangerously and turn back as it couldn't pass. I have previously reported this issue, bus drivers have reported it but no action has been taken. One side of Rushdene road should have double yellow lines.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rushdene, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish/flytipping, 21st June
item.description:
This has been marked as fixed but it has not been and is getting bigger. More rubbish is being added daily, its unsightly and now general waste, junk food wrappers, drinks cartons/bottles are spreading up either side of the alley. This has been reported over a month ago. Nothing has been done.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Owen Close, Thamesmead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The grass is too long,, 21st June
item.description:
This is a lovely space for small dogs. But the grass is has overgrown. Our puppy had to be sedated 2 days ago have a straw of grass removed. We would really appreciate it if the grass could be moved/ cut on edges too, please. THANKING YOU IN ADVANCE
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stanhope Grove, Beckenham, London
